name: Neon Sins -NS#02- Serenity
description: (SOUND ON) NS#02: "Thousands of lives buzzing under my feet. Their dreams, goals, love and rage, all so distant from up here. All the chaos vanishes and all you are left with is this moment of existing in pure serenity." |||---||| "Neon Sins is a window into the urban sprawling concrete jungle of the neo-future.
